explains: n. 预防措施，防备；避孕措施（precautions）
wordGroup: take precautions against vt. 采取措施预防
precaution against 提防，防范；耐心
safety precaution 安全预防措施

sentences.en: Could he not, just as a precaution, move to a place of safety?
sentences.cn: 难道他不能就当是一种防范搬到一个安全的地方去吗？

sentences.en: We are aware of the potential problems and have taken every precaution.
sentences.cn: 我们意识到了潜在的问题，已经采取了一切防范措施。

sentences.en: Take every precaution to prevent the flag from becoming soiled.
sentences.cn: 要采取一切预防措施，以防旗帜被弄脏。
